title: China to launch new quantum communications satellites in 2025
summary: HELSINKI — China will launch new quantum satellites into low Earth orbit next year, according to a scientist leading the project. Two to three quantum communications satellites will be launched […]

title: Moon vision
summary: A camera destined for the Moon became part of the astronauts’ toolkit during ESA’s latest PANGAEA geology training in Lanzarote, Spain.

title: Dominican Republic signs Artemis Accords
summary: The Dominican Republic has signed the Artemis Accords, the 44th nation to do so, NASA announced Oct. 7.

title: PLD Space unveils plans for larger launch vehicles and crewed spacecraft
summary: Spanish startup PLD Space, currently developing a small launch vehicle, has outlined plans to work on progressively larger, reusable rockets as well as a crewed spacecraft.

title: ESA’s Hera Planetary Defence Probe Launched on SpaceX Falcon 9
summary: The European Space Agency’s Hera planetary defence probe has begun its two-year journey to a distant asteroid after being successfully launched aboard a SpaceX Falcon 9 rocket. Hera was developed under ESA’s Space Safety Programme and has been tasked with surveying the results of NASA’s Double Asteroid Redirection Test (Dart) mission. The Dart mission tested […]

title: SpaceX Confirms Next Starship Test Will Try to Catch the Booster
summary: SpaceX confirmed today that the next test flight of its giant Starship booster will include the first attempt to catch the booster as it returns to Earth if all conditions...

title: SpaceX Targets October 13 for Starship 5th Flight Test & Historic Booster Catch Attempt

title: NASA Project Manager Honors Mother’s Impact
summary: Lee esta historia en Español aquí. Patricia Ortiz is proud to be a first-generation Salvadoran American. Her mother, born and raised in El Salvador, came to the United States for a better opportunity despite not knowing anyone or the English language.
